name: Action of Jet-pack Man - Fun Easy Physics Tap Jump 8-Bit Pixel Adventure For Kids
name_original: Action of Jet-pack Man - Fun Easy Physics Tap Jump 8-Bit Pixel Adventure For Kids
description:
The hero of the city is here to save the day! Help guide Jet-Pack Man through the treacherous obstacles in this addictive new survival game!

[How To Play]
-Tap the screen to have Jet-Pack Man fly!
-Dodge the obstacles to ensure his safety
